comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Very nice, not that well equipped clothing wise for the weather but I expect they were just posing for the camera.  Plenty of fire power there including that low slung pistol - an automatic something like a Luger/Mauser???

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: I think it is something like a Mauser.  I've seen pistols like that appear in other Godby photos.  I'm not entirely sure why they would need it, but I guess when you're wandering around in territory with bears and mountain lions then it pays to be prepared!  No bear spray back then, unless I'm mistaken.
